# Grafting Services for Apple Germplasm Collection

**Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice

**Reference Number**: 01B46-2023-019
**Publication Date**: April 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: April 26, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

## Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites suppliers to provide grafting and planting services for the rejuvenation of the apple germplasm collection at the Canadian Clonal Genebank. The services are required to use certified virus and disease resistant GENEVA® 11 and GENEVA® 41 apple rootstock.

## Requirements

* Grafting and planting services for the regeneration and rejuvenation of the Apple Germplasm Collection
* Suppliers must provide their Statement of Capabilities on or before the closing date of this notice

## Pre-identified Supplier

Upper Canada Growers Ltd. (921 Concession 2 Road, Niagara on the Lake ON L0S 1J0) has been pre-identified as a supplier for these services.

## Tender Documentation

The tender documentation is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) and includes the following:

* The Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) document
* The Statement of Capabilities form
